SELECT MCD.COMPANY_CD , MCD.COMPANY_NM , MCD.DIVISION_CD , MCD.DIVISION_NM , MWC.WORK_GROUP_CD , MWG.WORK_GROUP_NM , MPO.WORK_CENTER_CD , MWC.WORK_CENTER_NM , MPO.ITEM_ID , MI.ITEM_NM , MI.ITEM_SPEC , MPO.WR_STATE AS STATE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MPO.COMPANY_CD, MPO.DIVISION_CD, 'PP0004', MPO.WR_STATE, 'KR') FROM DUAL) AS STATE_NM , TO_CHAR(MPO.PLAN_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PLAN_DATE , TO_CHAR(MPO.PLAN_START_TIME ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PLAN_START_DATE , TO_CHAR(MPO.PLAN_END_TIME ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PLAN_END_DATE , MPO.PLAN_QTY , MPO.CONFIRM_QTY , MPO.PRIORITY , MPO.ROUTING_ID , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.fn_get_routing_name(MPO.COMPANY_CD, MPO.DIVISION_CD, MPO.ROUTING_ID) FROM DUAL) AS ROUTING_NM , MPO.PRODUCT_ORDER_ID AS WORK_ORDER_ID , MPO.DEMAND_ID , MPO.OUTSOURCING_YN , MPO.BOR_ID , MPO.UPDATE_BY ,(SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_USER_NAME(MPO.COMPANY_CD, MPO.DIVISION_CD, MPO.UPDATE_BY) FROM DUAL ) AS UPDATEBYNM , TO_CHAR(MPO.UPDATE_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPDATE_DATE FROM MOM_COM_DIV_V MCD , MOM_PRODUCT_ORDER MPO , MOM_ITEM MI , MOM_WORK_CENTER MWC , MOM_WORK_GROUP MWG WHERE MCD.COMPANY_CD = MPO.COMPANY_CD AND MCD.DIVISION_CD = MPO.DIVISION_CD AND MPO.COMPANY_CD = MI.COMPANY_CD AND MPO.DIVISION_CD = MI.DIVISION_CD AND MPO.ITEM_ID = MI.ITEM_ID AND MPO.COMPANY_CD = MWC.COMPANY_CD AND MPO.DIVISION_CD = MWC.DIVISION_CD AND MPO.WORK_CENTER_CD = MWC.WORK_CENTER_CD AND MWC.COMPANY_CD = MWG.COMPANY_CD AND MWC.DIVISION_CD = MWG.DIVISION_CD AND MWC.WORK_GROUP_CD = MWG.WORK_GROUP_CD AND MPO.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MPO.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MPO.PLAN_START_TIME BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{planDateSD, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{planDateED, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 0.99999
AND (UPPER(MPO.ITEM_ID) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{itemIdNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%' OR UPPER(MI.ITEM_NM) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{itemIdNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%')
AND (UPPER(MPO.PRODUCT_ORDER_ID) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{workOrderId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%')
AND MWC.WORK_GROUP_CD IN (${workGroupCd})
AND MPO.WORK_CENTER_CD IN (${workCenterCd})
AND MPO.WR_STATE IN (${state})
AND MPO.OUTSOURCING_YN = #{outsourcingYn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY MWG.WORK_GROUP_NM , MWC.WORK_CENTER_NM , MPO.PLAN_START_TIME , MPO.PRIORITY , MPO.ITEM_ID

SELECT MBP.OPERATION_SEQ , MBP.OPERATION_ID , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_OPERATION_NAME(MBP.COMPANY_CD, MBP.DIVISION_CD, MBP.OPERATION_ID) FROM DUAL) AS OPERATION_NM , MBP.WORK_STATION_CD , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_WORK_STATION_NAME(MBP.COMPANY_CD, MBP.DIVISION_CD, MBP.WORK_STATION_CD) FROM DUAL) AS WORK_STATION_NM , MBP.INSPECTION_YN , MBP.FINAL_OPERATION_YN , MBP.MILESTONE FROM MOM_BOR_PATH MBP WHERE MBP.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MBP.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MBP.BOR_ID = #{borId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY MBP.OPERATION_SEQ
